column1: pdf printable version facts. born: may 30, 1933. place of birth: carbondale, ildeath: june 14, 2015. place of death: carbondale, iloccupation: retired manager at southwestern bell. organizations: served in the u. s. army from 1952-1954; member of bethel reformed presbyterian church of sparta, il; retired member of the board of directors from first national bank of ava and a member of the elizabeth a. smysor charitable trust board. services. memorial networks partner provider: batesville interactive, all rights reserved. funeral home website by batesville, inc. privacy terms of use
